thread.section_title: CrystalPlus.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CrystalPlus.com | crystalplus.com | 2 of 34
thread.title: Bert

author: Bert
title: Bert
text: Easy to order and customize plaque using computer. Very good follow-up email communication and telephone throughout the process. Product produced quickly and accurately and shipped within a few days. The product quality was good but I think priced a little high. Also the shipping cost was very high for non-priority shipping. Unsure if I will buy again due to the cost but otherwise very pleased with the experience.
